title: Nihari, one of my new favorite braised meat dishes of all time.
description:
This video is #sponsored by Porter Road who delivers high-quality meats directly to your door. Use my link to get $20 off your first order of $100 or more: http://bit.ly/PRxEthan

Nihari is a popular food in India and Pakistan that is dished up with a centerpiece of meat, surrounded in a spiced gravy with oil over top. According to the Hindustan Times, it was originally meant to be eaten in the morning during cold weather, but it seems there are also shops open late into the night now.


🌳 Support on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/EthanC
